item.title: Static web page with Hugo and Git Hub
item.description: Step 1. Install Hugo Go to Hugo releases and download the appropriate version for your OS and architecture. More complete instructions are available at Install Hugo Step 2. Configure your Git Hub Pages You need a github account for this step. Step 3 Choose a theme In Hugo theme pages choose your favorite theme and download to your computer. Unzip the files into the hugo default theme folder: ./Sites/YOURSITE/Themes Then copy the content of config.
